Text:
Thank you!
...In Canada, the CBC is nearly caught up to the UK Coronation Street schedule, but I may just keep downloading yours -- the image quality is better than anything the CBC posts on their website.
Thanks again for all your dedication.
Yeah I am surprised how quickly they caught up, switching to that 1 format really made a difference. For those of with without cable I say thank you for the postings of this great show!
Cheers for another Corrie Fix Dean..not much chance of us catching up soon here in NZ, latest episode the train just came off the bridge lol.
